title: Lag spikes when playing
body:
Yo whats up. Have been getting some seriously fucking annoying lag spikes anytime i am playing league. Whenever i am not doing anything it's ok. but the moment I doing something. Fighting, moving etc. my ping explodes. it has costed me my promon and I have gotten into a lower priority queue because of that bullshit. And it frustrating as hell.

If anyone could give me some tips on how to make my ping remain stable I would appreciate it.

replies.body: my issues have been resolved with the update today.
it has been pretty common to a lot of people i know since 7.7 released including me. it is packet loss, however only to their server which sucks.
Been happening to me as well. Although for me my ping doesn't go up, it goes down, completely dc's me from the game & it has cost games. It's not just you.

It sounds like you're having a network issue like packet loss, which can case delays like that.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an analysis of what's happening.  The results will also offer some troubleshooting steps specific to you.  Let me know your results!

I am having the similar issues. I use to run around 40 to 60 ms now its in the 300 range.  I even turned on Enable Low Spec Mode and the best it could do was 245ms way above my usual.  This has been going on for two days now.
